name: Protect the Sandcastle (FoorFootStudios)
description:
Defend the sandcastle from dangerous sea creatures as long as possible!

This is an entry for the I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again) game jam.

Controls

W, A, S, D - Player movement (left, right, up, down)

Left click - Shoot to where your mouse is located

In-game Items

Huge Beachball - Pick this item up and there will be 3 huge beach balls falling on to the random location of the map

Incoming Wave - Pick this item up and there will be a wave incoming from random angle

Tools used

Unity, Bosca Ceoil, Krita, Paint.NET, GIMP, Audacity

My personal record is 200-ish. Let me know if you beat it!

Any feedback is appreciated. Enjoy the game :)

Created by FoorFootStudios
